title: The Best 74 AI Article Summarizer Tools in 2025
summary: Discover the power of AI Article Summarizers, designed to transform lengthy texts into concise, digestible summaries. These innovative tools save you time and enhance productivity by distilling essential information from articles, research papers, and reports. Whether you're a student, professional, or avid reader, our AI summarizers help you grasp key insights quickly and efficiently. Explore our curated selection of top-notch tools to streamline your reading experience and stay informed without the overwhelm. Dive in now and unlock the potential of AI-driven summarization!

tools.name: Grammarly
tools.description: Grammarly is an AI-powered writing assistant that enhances writing quality through grammar, spelling, and style corrections across multiple platforms.

tools.name: Liner
tools.description: Liner is an AI-powered research and productivity tool designed to streamline web browsing and information gathering.

tools.name: Tactiq
tools.description: Tactiq provides real-time transcription and meeting note automation for teams using video conferencing platforms.

tools.name: Notta
tools.description: Notta is an AI-powered transcription and note-taking platform that converts audio and video into text with real-time collaboration features.

tools.name: Consensus
tools.description: Consensus is an AI-powered search engine that provides evidence-based answers from scientific research.

tools.name: Semantic Scholar
tools.description: Semantic Scholar is an AI-powered research tool for discovering and understanding scientific literature across various fields.

tools.name: Fathom
tools.description: Fathom provides AI-powered meeting notes, transcription, and analytics to enhance productivity.

tools.name: StealthWriter
tools.description: StealthWriter.ai is an AI-powered tool designed to humanize AI-generated text and make it undetectable by AI detection tools.

tools.name: ScreenApp

tools.name: tl;dv
